Shaping our Future: Introducing our Planning function

We are continuously evolving to enhance efficiency, collaboration, and support for our brands. As part of this journey, we are introducing our Planning function (formerly known as Supply Chain), reinforcing its critical role in driving business success through strategic alignment and operational excellence.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=608&user=10620> 	

To further strengthen this function, beginning April 2025, the Planning teams will transition from Managed Companies to Operations, with Planning leads reporting directly to Mandi Kaur- VP Planning. This shift marks a significant milestone in repositioning the Planning function, building a unified community, fostering aligned processes, and sharpening the focus on strategic activities
